# StringSearchScope.freeformVideo

**Case**

The app supports searching for free-form video content like videos people upload to social media platforms.

## Declaration

```swift
case freeformVideo
```

## Overview

Don’t use `freeformVideo` for highly structured content like movies and episodes of TV shows. For structured video content, use [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/StringSearchScope/movies] or [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/StringSearchScope/tv] instead.

## Search scopes

- **StringSearchScope.general**: The app offers a general search functionality that’s exposed to the system.
- **StringSearchScope.movies**: The app supports searching for structured movie content.
- **StringSearchScope.tv**: The app supports searching for structured TV content including shows, seasons, or episodes.
